name: Aline Schwartz
comment: Best decision to choose Classic Photographers. I picked my own photographer and Ina was absolutely amazing. The website is easy to use, affordable, offered a discount and you can even make payments. I got 1500 amazing photos, a ton of video and the best experience.

name: Jerri Mack
comment: Excellent experience! Photographer was in constant communication with us and met our expectation. Quick turn around on photos. Event was on 2/19 and we already received our photos. Great shots! Would highly recommend Classic Photographers as vendor of choice!

name: Augusta Wolfe
comment: From the first time I clicked the link, the experience has been great! All my questions were answered in a timely fashion. Max our photographer was amazing and his partner, both captured such wonderful photos of our family. I would use them for another event in the future.
